subject: Acknowledgment.
body:
Mr. James Smith
Funds-Transfer Director
First Financial Trust

Attn: Arthur,

This is to acknowledge receipt of your email. Firstly, we would like to
inform you based on the details we received from the International Monetary
Fund (IMF) regarding your funds. We were informed by the International
Monetary Fund (IMF) officials that your funds were supposed to have been
received by you long ago but due to the corrupt practices of the Bank
officials in those Banks, that was the reason you have not yet received
your funds.

We personally carried out some investigations on those Banks in Africa and
Europe and we discovered that most funds beneficiaries are being asked to
pay certain irrelevant charges by those Banks officials especially Africa
countries and Europe, therefore making it very difficult for those
beneficiaries to claim their funds which is contrary to Section "37"
Subsection "C" of the Article XII of Banks and other financial decree of
1995 as amended in 1998.

Please note that you are to receive your funds ($9,500,000.00) through our
online banking system which we believe is the safest way of making
transfers in the modern banking system.

To enable us commence with the opening of your online banking account, you
are requested to provide us the below required information.

Your
Name:............................................................................................................................................
Occupation:............................................................................................................................................
Address..................................................................................................................................................
Date of
birth:..........................................................................................................................................
Marital
status:........................................................................................................................................
Sex:......................................................................................................................................................
Next of
kin:............................................................................................................................................
ID
Card..................................................................................................................................................
Telephone::............................................................................................................................................

Upon the receipt of the above required information, we shall commence
further with the opening of your online banking account and your funds will
be credited into your online banking account.

Sincerely Yours,
Mr. James Smith
(Funds-Transfer Director)

subject: Re: Acknowledgment.
body:
Hello Mr. James Smith,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite surprising to hear about the corrupt practices in those banks, I had no idea! 

I'm intrigued by this online banking system you mentioned. Could you please explain more about how it works? Is it safe and secure? Also, could you clarify what "Section Subsection of the Article XII of Banks and other financial decree" means?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Arthur

subject: Responding To Your Email.
body:
Mr. James Smith
Funds-Transfer Director
First Financial Trust

Attn: Arthur,

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email.  As stated in our
previous email, the online account is very safe and convinient to use. As
soon as your online account is opened and activated, your online account
information including the access code number will be sent to you to enable
you to login into your online account and have access to your funds in your
online account.

It is contrary to Section "37" Subsection "C" of the Article XII of Banks
and other financial decree of 1995 as amended in 1998 for bank officials to
demand for unnecessary charges like cost of transfer and certain other
changes before funds are transferred. Such charges are not meant to be paid
to the bank before funds are transferred.

However, you are advised to provide the required information to enable us
to proceed further with the opening of your online account.

Sincerely Yours,
Mr. James Smith
(Funds-Transfer Director)

subject: Re: Responding To Your Email.
body:
Hello Mr. James Smith,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation about the online account. It sounds very convenient indeed! I'm quite excited about this opportunity.

Just to clarify, you mentioned that there are certain charges not meant to be paid before funds are transferred. Could you please elaborate on what these charges might be? Also, could you explain a bit more about Section Subsection of Article XII? I'm not very familiar with banking decrees and would love to understand better.

You also mentioned some required information needed for opening the online account. Could you specify what kind of information is needed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Arthur
